QueryText: Asking about the insect management in rice field.
KCCAns: I advised him to spray Chlorpyriphos 20 EC 1250 ml/ha, Phosalone 35 EC 1500 ml/ha for Gall midge, Swarming caterpillar, Leaf folder (or) leaf roller and Malathion 50%EC 1150 ml/ha for Spiny beetle.
I suggest him to spray Neem oil @ 5 ml/litre of water
